overview: In his new comedy special, Russell Brand promises viewers the best stand-up special he has ever made. After years of deception, madness, and insanity from corporate media, the widely popular comedian offers a hysterical and irreverent take on hot-button topics, calling for freedom, unity, and sanity.
tagline: A call for Freedom, a call for unity, a call for sanity!
title: Russell Brand: Brandemic
